commit.message:
Improve Peers tab layout

Using the QSplitter and QScrollArea classes.

verification.payload:
tree 459753de0f4fe7b6f8eaa9eaa1dfbd6e12f64540
parent 0ed279cb4e4198e20a552c279c09134626bbb0bd

commit.message:
Do not deselect peer when switching away from tab

Effectevely reverts e0597268116cf90d961abeba9d14aaad0ab682d2 commit.
